project.description: This job will transfer a war file to the target directory of the kc-research server. Used to test the post-build step of the full kc job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSH_KEY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: File path of the ssh key to use for scp

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCP_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url for the target kuali-research aws ec2 instance

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EC2_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the user that is accessing the kuali-research aws ec2 instance via scp

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SRC_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: File path of the war to transfer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SRC_WAR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the war file to scp.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TARGET_WAR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Target directory for the war on the target server.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_TARGET_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Same directory as TARGET_DIR, but as known inside the docker container (mounted directory).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_CONTAINER_WAR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name and location inside the docker container where the war file is to be copied to once it has been scp'd into the mounted folder.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
scp \ -C \ -i $SSH_KEY \ $SRC_DIR/$SRC_WAR \ $EC2_USER@$SCP_URL:$TARGET_WAR
ssh \ $EC2_USER@$SCP_URL \ -i $SSH_KEY \ docker exec -d helloworldcontainer cp -f $DOCKER_TARGET_WAR/$SRC_WAR $DOCKER_CONTAINER_WAR
